speaker: Maelle
line: That’s a lot of red trees to search–

speaker: Lune
line: They must have some sort of track or trail leading to the village.

speaker: Gustave
line: Wait, I heard something. It might be Nevrons. Be careful, okay?

speaker: Maelle
line: Wow…

speaker: Gustave
line: That’s a lot of dead Nevrons.

speaker: Lune
line: Who did th–
NEVRON! ALERT! NEVRON! ALERT!

speaker: Gustave
line: I don’t see any–

speaker: Lune
line: I think they mean us.

speaker: Maelle
line: They must be Gestrals! They’re cute, but they’re idiots.

speaker: Gustave
line: Oh, fucking– Hey, hey, we’re NOT Nevrons!

speaker: Maelle
line: Don’t worry, we don’t want to hurt you, Patate. Noco sent us.

speaker: Karatom
line: Our Sakapatate was supposed to be INVINCIBLE. Wait– Noco sent you? OH! DID NOCO SEND YOU TO HELP US BUILD A BETTER SAKAPATATE?!

speaker: Lune
line: If you guide us to your village–

speaker: Karatom
line: OOOOOH, what’s this? Cool. Ok, deal! Give me the arm for our Sakapatate and I’ll show you the village.

speaker: Maelle
line: Guide us to your village, and maybe, he’ll make you something better.

speaker: Gustave
line: Wait, what d’you–

speaker: Karatom
line: How do I know you’re not lying?

speaker: Maelle
line: Trust me, I hate liars.

speaker: Karatom
line: Mmmmmmm. OK DEAL! Follow me. There are lots more Sakapatates. You’ll be fine, just don’t die.

speaker: Gustave
line: You’re better with Gestrals than humans.

speaker: Maelle
line: They’re less complicated.

speaker: Gustave
line: These things are fascinating–

speaker: Lune
line: How do they even stand? This place is confusing.

speaker: Maelle
line: They built it to make their village harder to find.

speaker: Tropa
line: INTRUDER ALERT! INTRUDER ALERT! Send forth the ULTIMATE WEAPON!

speaker: Peron
line: But they’re human.

speaker: Tropa
line: Shhh. Now’s our chance to test the Ultimate Sakapatate in a REAL fight.

speaker: Peron
line: Oh, yeah, so cool, so cool!

speaker: Gustave
line: They sound like kids.

speaker: Lune
line: We must be getting close to the Village.

speaker: Tropa
line: En garde, warriors! Face our ULTIMATE CREATION!

speaker: Maelle
line: Kinda looks the same as all the others.

speaker: Karatom
line: Those were supposed to be invincible, but this one is even MORE invincible.

speaker: Gustave
line: Hey, don’t get cocky, Maelle. Look at its equipment. That looks a lot more dangerous than the others. No, seriously.

speaker: Peron
line: This Sakapatate is GARBAGE!

speaker: Karatom
line: Oh, you’re good! Chef’s definitely gonna wanna meet you.

speaker: Maelle
line: Chef?

speaker: Karatom
line: Golgra: The BEST FIGHTER of ALL the Gestrals EVER, alive OR hibernating. Golgra will wanna see you right away. Let’s go!
